# text_amh = "አብዛኛው የዲጂታል ሽግግር በዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ታይቶ የማይታወቅ ቢሆንም፣ ሰላማዊው የስልጣን ሽግግር ግን አይደለም” ሲሉ የኦባማ ልዩ ረዳት የሆኑት ኮሪ ሹልማን ሰኞ በብሎግ ፅፈዋል።
# text_ipa = ”abzaaw yädi ital gigir bäyunaytd stet tayto yämytawäq bihonm sälamawi yäslt’an ggr gn aydäläm” silu yäobama rädat yähonut kori ulman säo bäbg s’fäwal
# text_en = “While much of the digital transition is unprecedented in the United States, the peaceful transition of power is not,” Obama special assistant Kori Schulman wrote in a blog post Monday.

# text_amh = በካፒቶል ሂል የማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ሽግግሮችን ለሚከተሉ ይህ ትንሽ የተለየ ይሆናል።
# text_ipa = bekapītoli hīli layi yemahiberawī mīdīya shigigirochini lemīketelu, yihi tinishi yeteleye yihonali
# text_en = For those who follow social media transitions on Capitol Hill, this will be a little different.
#For each toekn : column1 = toekn in the language, column2 = English Gloss, column3 = POS, column4 = comment
# text_amh = ነገር ግን ኢሚግሬሽንን ስለመገደብ ካለፈው ንግግሩ እረፍት ላይ፣ የጂኦፒ ተሿሚው እንደ ፕሬዝደንትነቱ በ"ብቃት ስርዓት" ላይ በመመስረት ህጋዊ ስደተኞችን “እጅግ በጣም ብዙ” እንደሚፈቅድ አስታውቋል።

# text_ipa = negeri gini īmīgirēshinini silemegedebi kalefewi nigigiru irefiti layi, yejī'opī teshwamīwi inide pirēzidenitinetu be"bik'ati siri'ati" layi bememesireti higawī sidetenyochini “ijigi bet'ami bizu” inidemīfek'idi āsitawik'wali.

# text_en = But in a break from his past rhetoric about curtailing immigration, the GOP nominee proclaimed that as president he would allow “tremendous numbers” of legal immigrants based on a “merit system.”
ላይ በመመስረት ህጋዊ ስደተኞችን “እጅግ በጣም ብዙ” እንደሚፈቅድ አስታውቋል።
#For each toekn : column1 = toekn in the language, column2 = English Gloss, column3 = POS, column4 = comment
# text_amh = በሰሜን ካሮላይና ዩኒቨርስቲ በስፖርት ሜዳ ለተሰበሰበው ህዝብ "ስለዚህ ትንሽ ጫና ማድረግ እጠላለሁ፣ የሪፐብሊኩ እጣ ፈንታ ግን በትከሻችሁ ላይ ነው" ብሏል።
# text_ipa = besemēni karolayina yunīverisitī besiporiti mēda letesebesebewi hizibi "silezīhi tinishi ch'ana madiregi it'elalehu, yerīpebilīku it'a fenita gini betikeshachihu layi newi" bilwali
# text_en = “So I hate to put a little pressure on you, but the fate of the republic rests on your shoulders,” he told the crowd gathered on a sports field at the University of North Carolina.

# text_amh = በጥቅምት ወር መጀመሪያ ላይ የሽግግሩ ቡድን ከቴክኖሎጂ ሎቢስቶች ጋር ለመገናኘት ተመሳሳይ ቦታን ተጠቅሞ የኡበር ተወካዮችን፣ የአሜሪካ ሞሽን ፎቶግራፍ ማህበር፣ የሸማቾች ቴክኖሎጂ ማህበር እና ሌሎች ቡድኖችን በመጋበዝ ነበር።

# text_ipa = bet'ik'imiti weri mejemerīya layi yeshigigiru budini ketēkinolojī lobīsitochi gari lemegenanyeti temesasayi botani tet'ek'imo ye'uberi tewekayochini, ye'āmērīka moshini photogirafi mahiberi, yeshemachochi tēkinolojī mahiberi ina lēlochi budinochini bemegabezi neberi
